author: mgrigorov
msg: WICKET-3719 Component's markup cannot be found in Ajax requests if the parent is transparent
Update the test case to use MockPageManager that clones the stored pages so that they lose their transient markup.
NOTE: we need to think about the way to setup custom IProvider's for the test application. Using Application#init() doesn't work because BaseWicketTester overrides anything we try to setup.
